abstract: Companies are learning to combine the new approaches of design thinking with the time-tested analyses of Six Sigma.
snippet: Companies are learning to combine the new approaches of design thinking with the time-tested analyses of Six Sigma.
lead_paragraph: FOR decades, companies from Cisco Systems to Staples to Bank of America have worked to embed the basic techniques of Six Sigma, the business approach that relies on measurement and analysis to make operations as efficient as possible.

headline.main: Welcoming the New, Improving the Old
headline.print_headline: Welcoming The New, Improving The Old
